name: Turbeets Racing
description:
To impress everyone at the Ludum Dare World Radish Fair of 2023, you decided to finally catch those 2 legged radishes that has been wandering around your turbeets fields. But the damn things are fast. Try to get to the finish line before them in 3 races !

Controls :

a-d  to move,

r to restart

Fullscreen on your own risk for UI.

Enjoy ;)
